Name: WATER GLYCOL LOOP
checklistText:
<size=21>SYSTEMS & MONITORING CHECKS
Secondary water-glycol loop check</size>
ECS IND sw - SEC
SEC COOL LOOP PUMP - AC1
	GLY DISCH SEC PRESS -39-51 psig
	ACCUM SEC QTY IND - 30-55%
SEC COOL LOOP - EVAP
After 5 min:
	SEC EVAP TEMP OUT - 38-50.5° F
SEC COOL LOOP EVAP - RSET 1 min, off (ctr)
SEC COOL LOOP PUMP - off (ctr)
ECS IND sw - PRIM
